## PRODUCT CATALOG FOR AI TRAINING
Complete 96+ Battery Configuration Lineup:

### Golf Cart Batteries (24 Models)
- 6V 225Ah: Flooded ($168), AGM, Gel, Lithium (Call for Pricing)
- 8V 170Ah: Flooded ($178), AGM, Gel, Lithium (Call for Pricing)
- 12V 105Ah: Flooded ($265), AGM, Gel, Lithium (Call for Pricing)

### LSV Batteries (24 Models)
- Low Speed Vehicle applications
- Same voltage/technology configurations as Golf Cart
- Optimized for neighborhood transportation

### NEV Batteries (24 Models) 
- Neighborhood Electric Vehicle compliant
- DOT regulation compliance
- Street-legal operation specifications

### MSV Batteries (24 Models)
- Medium Speed Vehicle enhanced performance
- Extended range applications
- Higher capacity configurations

## BATTERY TECHNOLOGIES
1. Flooded Lead-Acid: Traditional, proven technology
2. AGM (Absorbed Glass Mat): Maintenance-free, vibration resistant
3. Gel: Deep cycle performance, extreme temperature operation
4. Lithium: Lightweight, fast charging, extended lifespan
